page.title: 01UPPER WEARDALE:A SUMMARY
page.content: We live in a river valley called Weardale. It is a{countryside}area, surrounded by farmland , meadows, pastures and on the hills is fell. Most of the farmers keep sheep and cattle. There are two{villages}and two hamlets in the area. Westgate is the biggest it has a{population}of 386. It has a church ,chapel, a butchers,a pub and 2 shops. St.Johns Chapel has a population of 353, a primary school, bank, post office, an auction mart, 4 shops, a church and chapel. Daddry Sheild is a hamlet with a phone box and post box, East Blackdene has no amenities. In summer the area gets lots of visitors from the Sunderland area. In winter we get lots of snow.
